module.name: cbs_validations

element.name: CheckEmail
element.short: Check if an e-mail address is valid or not.

element.name: ValueInRange
element.short: Check if a value is within the specified range.

element.name: ValueInSet
element.short: Check if a value is within the specified array of values.

element.name: CheckCPF
element.short: Check if a CPF number (Brazil) is valid or not.

element.name: CheckCNPJ
element.short: Check if a CNPJ number (Brazil) is valid or not.

element.name: ValidDate
element.short: Check if a date string is valid or not.

element.name: ValidPartialDate
element.short: Check if a partial date is valid or not.

element.name: PartialDateIsEmpty
element.short: Check if a partial date is empty or not.

element.name: IsFutureDate
element.short: Check if a date is a future date or not.

element.name: IsFuturePartialDate
element.short: Check if a partial date is a future partial date or not.

element.name: DiffCampos
element.short: Check for differences between two values.

element.name: CodigoExiste
element.short: Check if a key value already exists.

element.name: CheckRequiredFilled
element.short: Check if a required field is filled or not.

element.name: RegistroExiste
element.short: Check if a field value already exists in the specified table.

element.name: ForeignValueExists
element.short: Check if a foreign key already exists in its original table.

element.name: RegistroDuplicado
element.short: Check if a record is duplicated or not.

element.name: RegistroAtivo
element.short: Check if a record is active or not.

element.name: SpuhAllowed
element.short: Determine if the use of abreviation sp. is allowed or not.

element.name: EpithetIsEmpty
element.short: Check if the epithet of a name is empty or not.

element.name: CoordenadaIsOk
element.short: Check if a geographic coordinate is valid or not.

module.short: Library with validation functions for various types and values.
